item.title: Transport v1.1.12.43
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.1.12.43
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 18 Oct 2019 15:48:22 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
Control Experiment.vi provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device, how the lockin is connected to the device, configures the Krohn Hite amplifier (and Pickering switch if you have one), and sets the base path for saving data.

[SweepControl.lvclass]
Sweep Control.vi: Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
Continuous B sweep.vi: For sweeping B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments.
- Lockin vs Vsg (or Vbg) (Lockin_Vsg.vi)
- Lockin vs Time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi (under development)
- IV curves (IV.vi)

Release Notes: [1.1.12.43]
Control Experiment.vi
- Fix issue that would cause the wiring description to not be written properly
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.8.5.11
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.8.5.11
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 17 Oct 2019 14:52:56 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462). This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO. You can configure a number of analog outputs (up to 8) to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with DC offsets. Each of the analog inputs (up to 8) can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.8.5.11]
Add 5 s overhead time to sweep end condition check
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Transport v1.1.11.42
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.1.11.42
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Thu, 17 Oct 2019 14:39:22 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
Control Experiment.vi provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device, how the lockin is connected to the device, configures the Krohn Hite amplifier (and Pickering switch if you have one), and sets the base path for saving data.

[SweepControl.lvclass]
Sweep Control.vi: Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
Continuous B sweep.vi: For sweeping B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments.
- Lockin vs Vsg (or Vbg) (Lockin_Vsg.vi)
- Lockin vs Time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi (under development)
- IV curves (IV.vi)

Release Notes: [1.1.11.42]
Continuous B Sweep.vi and Sweep Control.vi
- Add calls to Lockin_Sweep

Lockin_Sweep
- Fix issue that would not properly reset graphs
- Update the way final sweep results are calculated and displayed

Control Experiment.vi
- Change fonts to (hopefully) be more uniform across operating systems
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.8.4.10
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.8.4.10
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 17 Oct 2019 13:44:56 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462). This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO. You can configure a number of analog outputs (up to 8) to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with DC offsets. Each of the analog inputs (up to 8) can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.8.4.10]
Improve Waveguide Modeling
- Now model V+ and V-
- Indices are hardcoded [0: Vs / I, 1: Vsg, 2: V+, 3: V-]
- Parse Waveguide Model--Cluster.ctl inside LockinDAQ.Simulate Waveguide.vi
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

You can configure a number of analog outputs (up to 8) to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with DC offsets. Each of the analog inputs (up to 8) can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

- Indices are hardcoded [0: Vs / I, 1: Vsg, 2: V+, 3: V-]

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.8.3.7
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.8.3.7
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 16 Oct 2019 21:16:31 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462). This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO. You can configure a number of analog outputs (up to 8) to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with DC offsets. Each of the analog inputs (up to 8) can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.8.3.7]
- revert to "static" AO/AI (configured for only up to 4 DAQ cards)
- change sampling of results to Fs in sweep mode
- update V resolution when calling setSweep remotely
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Transport v1.1.10.41
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.1.10.41
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Wed, 16 Oct 2019 15:28:21 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
Control Experiment.vi provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device, how the lockin is connected to the device, configures the Krohn Hite amplifier (and Pickering switch if you have one), and sets the base path for saving data.

[SweepControl.lvclass]
Sweep Control.vi: Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
Continuous B sweep.vi: For sweeping B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments.
- Lockin vs Vsg (or Vbg) (Lockin_Vsg.vi)
- Lockin vs Time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi (under development)
- IV curves (IV.vi)

Release Notes: [1.1.10.41]
- add APIs to read *experiment*.json descriptor files

Lockin_Vsg
- Fix issue where initial wait time would not be set properly
- Update front panel controls for Experiment Folder and Experiment when called as subVI of Sweep Control

Lockin_Sweep
- Modify to support newest Lockin sweep mode (sweeps multiple channels)

Continuous B Sweep.vi
- Fix issue where notifier was not added to data cluster

Control Experiment.lvclass
- Add accessor Read Experiment Description.vi
item.dc:creator: Levylab
